 014:     """
 015:     Main function for the harmonic oscillator.

 018:     seed: int

 022:     iflag : integer
 023:         If zero start the simulation "cold", all the spin up.
 024:         If one start the simulation at T infinite, random spin.
 025:     measures : integer
 026:         Number of evaluation of energy and magnetization.
 027:     i_decorrel : integer

 029:     i_term: integer
